speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I’m not in the mood for this crap!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand you're frustrated. I'm calling about your account. Can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the f*** should I tell you anything? Just get lost!

speaker: Agent
text: I can help you better if I confirm your identity. It’s standard procedure. Please provide your date of birth.

speaker: Customer
text: What part of 'leave me the hell alone' don’t you get? I’m not giving you anything!

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your honesty. However, I cannot discuss account details until I verify your identity. Could you please provide your address?

speaker: Customer
text: This is so f****** ridiculous! It’s not like I owe you anything anyway!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. However, the account is still overdue. We need to verify it to assist you. Can you confirm your address?

speaker: Customer
text: You piece of s***, I told you I’m not giving you anything!

speaker: Agent
text: I respect your choice, but without verification, I cannot proceed. I’m here to help when you’re ready.

speaker: Customer
text: Whatever, just shut the f*** up!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time. Feel free to call back if you wish to discuss this further.

speaker: Customer
text: Yeah, right. Don’t hold your breath!
